name: Spicy Cucumber Margarita
label: Tequila
instructions: Add tequila, lime juice, agave, orange liquor, and cucumber to a blender or capped jug.  Pulse or shake for 1 minute, or until the mixture is smooth.  Strain out the liquid into a cocktail shaker.

Add the jalapeno slices, and muddle until the margarita has your desired level of heat (Note: that the longer the jalapenos sit in the mixture, the more they will release their flavor, so heads up!):  Add a handful of ice, and shake the mixture vigorously for a few seconds so that it is chilled.

Then immediately strain into serving glasses 3/4 full that have been rimmed with salt-chili garnish, filled with ice. Pour remaining 1/4 with ginger beer. Stir in slightly and add optional garnishes of lime wedges, cucumbers, and jalapenos
